What's In The Box?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Items: What's In The Box?
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, December 22, 2002 - 11:09 pm:

Under construction.

Here's a chart of what I have found in the various boxes won in tournaments. I will add to it as I find more.

Wood Box
ItemDescription
HonCandyHoney Candy. Great for monster snacks.
NewtBitter, roasted Newt. Ingred. of medicine.
NitroBerRefreshing Nitroberry helps relieve stress.


Iron Box
ItemDescription
GelatinFills you up but hardly any calories.
StarPrun
NewtBitter, roasted Newt. Ingred. of medicine.


SilvrBox
ItemDescription
DefCharmAn amulet that holds the spirit of a tough warrior.
EaglMaskCeremonial Eagle Mask with very sharp eyes.
LuckFragMysterious lucky fragment. Keep it bottled!


Black Box
ItemDescription
VicCharmVictory charm. Comes thru in the clutch
SeeScrolScroll of secrets on anticipating attacks.
PowStoneStone of strength. Increases a monster ability.
LuckFragMysterious lucky fragment. Keep it bottled!
SpdStoneMakes one fleet. Increases a monster ability.
DefStoneStone of toughness. Increases a monster ability.
EaglMaskCeremonial Eagle Mask with very sharp eyes.
WndStonePower of wind. Increases a monster ability
LifStoneLife-force stone. Increases a monster ability.
IntStoneStone of knowledge. Increases a monster ability.
DefCharmAn amulet that holds the spirit of a tough warrior.
